name: KeepTheTrain (VR)
description:
Prototype runner game on VR

Don't miss the train, run at speed, grab the pipes, jump and slide.

Controls:

  • Jump up: raise arms (chest level), make a fist and pull down.
  • Jump to the left: raise arms, squeeze hands and pull to the right.
  • Jump to the right: raise arms, squeeze hands and pull to the left.
  • Jump down: hands down, squeeze into fist and pull up.
  • Dash: Stretch out your arms, squeeze your hands and pull towards yourself.

         

Grab the pipe: point your hand at the pipe and squeeze 

Exit:

Done on:

Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700 CPU @ 3.20GHz 3.19GHz

16.0GB RAM

NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6gb

Install instructions

1. Extract "KeepTheTrain.zip"

2. Open "KeepTheTrain.exe"
